BodyName: Committee on Environmental Protection, Resiliency and Waterfronts

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to updating stormwater management plans and reports
Items.MatterName: Updating stormwater management plans and reports

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Environment Facilities Corporation to remove restrictive barriers and uncap funds New York City can receive for water infrastructure upgrades.
Items.MatterName: New York State Environment Facilities Corporation to remove restrictive barriers and uncap funds New York City can receive for water infrastructure upgrades.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to the creation of an inland flood hazard area map, climate adaptation planning, and resilient construction for inland areas
Items.MatterName: Creation of an inland flood hazard area map, climate adaptation planning, and resilient construction for inland areas.
